io.inversion.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.inversion.utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of utility methods designed to make java programming less verbose

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.lang.Object obj1,
                            java.lang.Object obj2)
        A null safe loose equality checker.
        Parameters:
        obj1 -
        obj2 -
        Returns:
        Test for strict == equality, then .equals() equality, then .toString().equals() equality. Either param can be null.
